•We make an assessment to identify and evaluate the most important 
sustainability issues for AerCap and the wider global communities in which we operate 
•This is a constantly evolving analysis that changes and is updated through regular engagement with our stakeholders and other expert bodies within the industry 
•We disclose to, and are rated by, several ESG rating agencies and recognize that a company’s sustainability performance as rated by these agencies is becoming an increasingly important component of stakeholder decision making
•We speak regularly to sustainability experts and seek their views on our approach to ESG and significant issues. We will continue to engage with the sustainability community with the goal of making sure our approach remains relevant and in line with best practices in the industry
•We welcome ongoing feedback and dialogue from our stakeholders, and queries should be directed to our Head of Investor RelationsInvestors & Lenders
